summary: I WAS DRIVING AND MY POWER STEERING SERVICE LIGHT CAME ON AND BECAME VERY HARD TO STEER AND NOW MY TRACTION CONTROL LIGHT IS ON. IT TELLS ME TO HAVE SERVICED IMMEDIATELY BUT WHEN I CALL LINCOLN DEALERSHIP THEY TELL ME THEY CAN'T EVEN GET ME IN TIL OCTOBER 16TH. I AM NOW CONCERNED THAT I MAY END UP IN A CRASH. I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS IS NOT A RECALL.
